execution_plan.description: Retrieve product identifiers, names and prices from the primary store database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS product_id, name AS product_name, price AS product_price, sku AS product_sku, category_id FROM products;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve item codes, titles and amounts (in cents) from the alternate store and convert cents to price units by dividing by 100.
execution_plan.query: SELECT code AS item_code, title AS item_title, amount_in_cents, (amount_in_cents::numeric / 100.0) AS item_price FROM items;
